about_the_game:
Captain! Please pilot the "Devourer" and lead human civilization towards the other side of the universe!

In the near future, Earth is facing an energy crisis. The "Devourer" is the cosmic ark built by humanity in its final moments. Now, with all the crew aboard, you, as the supreme leader, are about to guide the last ember of humanity on a long voyage.

Before you begin the "Devouring" plan, here's a brief overview of what you need to do next:

  • Activate the Decomposition Cannon. The target planet will be shattered into particles, and we will collect the dispersed particles into the spaceship's reactor.

  • Adjust the Reactor. Rearrange the various modules around the reactor, using them to trigger the particles at their critical points during the upcoming reaction phase, initiating a chain reaction.

  • Activate the Reactor. The modules will activate sequentially, and the particle clusters that break through their critical points will generate the energy required by the spaceship.

  • Select the Next Destination. Use the consumed energy to warp to the next target planet. Allow me to remind you that you must plan your course carefully, based on the current energy reserves of the ship, to avoid getting stuck in a deadlock where energy runs out.

Let’s begin with this blue planet beneath our feet. This homeworld of the human race will give its last motherly love to its firstborn, becoming the first stepping stone on your journey through the stars.

Good luck, The Last Captain of Homo sapiens.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 3G
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: "Critical Point" is a sci-fi strategy game. As the leader of the "Devourer" spaceship, you must not only solve the ship's energy crisis by adjusting the positions of various modules in the reactor to enhance the chain reactions between particles, but also plan the ship's warp routes.
